description: Get position configuration for a given resource.

parameters.name: ResourceIdentifier
parameters.description: Resource identifier used in a position configuration.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: Resource type of the resource for which position configuration is retrieved.

nested_items.name: SemtechGnss
nested_items.description: The Semtech GNSS solver object details.

nested_items.name: Provider
nested_items.description: The vendor of the solver object.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of positioning solver used.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status indicating whether the solver is enabled.

nested_items.name: Fec
nested_items.description: Whether forward error correction is enabled.

nested_items.name: Destination
nested_items.description: The position data destination that describes the AWS IoT rule that processes the device's position data for use by AWS IoT Core for LoRaWAN.
